label: Chez Nous Main
info: Helper subroutine flows for accessing the Hue Bridge API on Chez Nous Main.

name: HomeKit Switch Auto-Off
info: If the incoming payload is `{"On":true}`, pass it through to the first output and then send `{"On":false}` one second later on the second output. Otherwise, ignore the incoming message.

name: East Facing Shades
info:
Send message with payload of `"open"` or `"close"` depending on the time of day as specified by the output of an instance of the _Time Strings to Minutes_ subflow node the value of the `RANGE` environment variable, as described below.

**On input:**

1. `$RANGE` is the number of minutes that the shades should remain closed after sunrise.
2. `msg.sunrise` is the number of minutes after midnight at which sunrise occurs.
3. `msg.minutes` is the current number of minutes after midnight.


**On output:**

`msg.payload` is `"open"` unless one of the following is true:

1. `msg.minutes` is between 1320 (10pm) and 1440 (midnight) _or_
2. `msg.minutes` is less than `msg.sunrise` + `$RANGE` (i.e. it is earlier than the configured number of minutes after sunrise)

If either of the preceding conditions is true, then `msg.payload` is `"close".`

name: West Facing Shades
info:
Send message with payload of `"open"` or `"close"` depending on the time of day as specified by the output of an instance of the _Time Strings to Minutes_ subflow node the value of the `RANGE` environment variable, as described below.

**On input:**

1. `$RANGE` is the number of minutes before sunset that the shades should close.
2. `msg.sunrise` is the number of minutes after midnight at which sunrise occurs.
3. `msg.sunset` is the number of minutes after midnight at which sunset occurs.
4. `msg.minutes` is the current number of minutes after midnight.


**On output:**

`msg.payload` is `"open"` unless one of the following is true:

1. `msg.minutes` is between 1320 (10pm) and 1440 (midnight) _or_
2. `msg.minutes` is less than `msg.sunrise`
3. `msg.minutes` is between `msg.sunset` - `$RANGE` and `msg.sunset` (i.e. it is later than the configured number of minutes before sunset but before the sun has actually set.)

If any of the preceding conditions are true, then `msg.payload` is `"close".`

name: Time Strings to Minutes
info:
Add `msg.minutes`, `msg.sunrise` and `msg.sunset` properties based on `msg.now`, `msg.start` and `msg.end` output from a _suncalc_ `Sun rise/set` message.

Each of the added properties is the number of minutes after midnight represented by the corresponding ISO timestamp string.

name: At Start
info:
Send a message when the flow starts and, optionally, at a fixed interval thereafter.

Subsequent messages can also be generated on demand by sending anything to this function node's input. In the latter case, the input message is ignored and the triggered message will have the same content as those generated by timers.

Use in subflows where `trigger` nodes are not allowed.

| Environment Variable | Default   | Description                                                                       |
|----------------------|-----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `DELAY`              | `1000`    | Milliseconds to wait at start before sending a message                            |
| `INTERVAL`           | `0`       | If greater than 0, milliseconds to wait between subsequent messages               |
| `TOPIC`              | `"timer"` | Value for `msg.topic`                                                             |
| `PAYLOAD`            | `null`    | Value for `msg.topic`; if `null`, then payload will contain the current timestamp |

name: Extract Relevant Group Metadata
info: Extract and consolidate metadata for a room or a zone. Note that from an API point of view, the only difference between rooms and zones is the URI used to access them.

name: Activate dynamic sunset scene on Chez Nous Main bridge
Use within 30 seconds of pressing link button on Chez Nous Main bridge
Dining room lights group toggle switch
Activate dining room lighting scene as selected on the dashboard
Activate dining room shade scene as selected on the dashboard
